title: Babo Botanicals After Sun Soothing Hydrating Aloe Vera Gel With Natural witch Hazel and Cucumber, Vegan, For Babies, Kids or Sensitive Skin - 8 oz.
features: 100% GOOD FOR YOU & YOUR FAMILY: A super hydrating & non-sticky gel. Ultra rich, hydrating formula that leaves your skin smooth for optimal after sun care.
FORMULATED FOR VERY SENSITIVE SKIN: This sunscreen is specifically developed with organic Aloe Vera Juice to provide you with optimal hydration after sun exposure.
PLANTED BASED FORMULA: Specially formulated with eucalyptus and green tea that helps cool and soothe skin. Enriched with Babo's Organic Nutri-Soothe Complex.
NO HARSH CHEMICALS OR IRRITANTS: Dermatologist tested to reduce risk of allergic reaction. Gluten, soy, dairy, peanut free. Made in USA. B Corp Certified.
GENTLE ENOUGH FOR THE ENTIRE FAMILY: Apply to baby's face and body after sun exposure. Use daily or reapply as needed. Perfect for the entire family.
description: Babo Botanicals After Sun Soothing Hydrating Aloe Gel For Sensitive Skin, Hyaluronic acidand rosehip oil moisturize dry or itchy skin. Smells fresh and leaves no tacky residue. Ultra rich, hydrating botanicals leaves skin smooth for optimal after sun care. Ultra sheer and light weight. Witch hazel and eucalyptus cools and refreshes. Green tea and arnica help soothe and treat parched skin.
